candidates.body:
- **feat: init 0.15**
- **fix: bump vers**
- **fix: keyring test not passing macos**
- **fix: notify 6**
- **fix: bump vers**
- **feat: Pods and container explorer for Kube protocol (#281)**
- **fix: don't clear screen after terminating termscp**
- **fix: issue 277 Fix a bug in the configuration page, which caused being stuck if the added SSH key was empty**
- **fix: popup texts**
- **249 feature request better search results (#282)**
- **feat: it is now possible to cancel find command; show find progress (#284)**
- **fix: `isolated-tests` feature to run tests for releasing on distributions which run in isolated environments (#286)**
- **280 feature request go to path auto completion (#287)**
- **fix: set date**
- **fix: github ci is stable and reliable (one worker broken each 2 weeks)**
- **fix: ci**

candidates.title: fix: `isolated-tests` feature to run tests for releasing on distributions which run in isolated environments
249 feature request better search results
candidates.body: [Issue 249](https://github.com/veeso/termscp/issues/249): The old *find* command has been replaced with a brand new explorer with support to 🪄 **Fuzzy search** 🪄. The command is still `<F>`.

candidates.title: feat: Pods and container explorer for Kube protocol
candidates.body:
- [Issue 268](https://github.com/veeso/termscp/issues/268): Pods and container explorer for Kube protocol.
  - BREAKING ‼️ Kube address argument has changed; see manual!
  - Pod and container argumets have been removed; from now on you will connect with the following syntax to the provided namespace: `/pod-name/container-name/path/to/file`

candidates.title: chore: bump ring to 0.17

labels.name: enhancement
labels.description: An improvement for an existing feature

candidates.body:
## Description

Bump rustls to v0.21.12 so the project uses ring 0.17, which brings extra platform support e.g. RISC-V.

candidates.title: Optimize transfers
candidates.body:
# ISSUE 133 - Transfer resuming

Fixes #133 

## Description

- **Transfers optimized**:
  - If local/remote file have the same "last modification time" (`mtime`), the file is not transferred
  - When the file is exchanged, all times attributes are set (if supported by the protocol)

## Type of change

Please select relevant options.

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [x] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] This change requires a documentation update

- **feat: Pods and container explorer for Kube protocol (#281)**

- **fix: `isolated-tests` feature to run tests for releasing on distributions which run in isolated environments (#286)**
- **280 feature request go to path auto completion (#287)**
- **fix: set date**
- **fix: github ci is stable and reliable (one worker broken each 2 weeks)**
- **fix: ci**
